```py
>>> import numpy as np
>>> from scipy.special import spence
>>> import matplotlib.pyplot as plt 
```

```py
spence(z) + spence(1 - z) = pi**2/6 - log(z)*log(1 - z) 
```

```py
>>> fig, ax = plt.subplots()
>>> x = np.linspace(0, 6, 400)
>>> ax.plot(x, spence(x))
>>> ax.grid()
>>> ax.set_xlabel('x')
>>> ax.set_title('spence(x)')
>>> plt.show() 
```
